scripts.test: NATS_PORT=4224 docker-compose -f test/docker-compose.yaml -p unittest up -d ;NATS_SERVERS="localhost:4224" ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha -R spec test/*.spec.js --exit;NATS_PORT=4224 docker-compose -f test/docker-compose.yaml -p unittest down
scripts.build:docker: npm run build; docker build --no-cache --build-arg NPM_TOKEN=${NPM_TOKEN} -t registry.gitlab.com/fdt2k/wedplan/session ./docker/prod ; docker push registry.gitlab.com/fdt2k/wedplan/session;
